title.rendered: Roomi vs Renthop: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
You’ve put down the deposit for your new home, filled in all the paperwork, and now want a roommate to save some money. If you’re on the lookout for a roommate to split the bills with to save some cash, Roomi’s here! In this guide, we’ll walk you through the best roommate finder, Roomi, and how it compares to Renthop.

Pricing: Are these Roommate Finder Apps Free or Paid?

Typically, a lot of roommate finder platforms are free to download and browse listings. On a free plan, you can access basic features like searching for potential roommates’ profiles. However, you may have to pay in order to use some of the more advanced features on offer.

Renthop offers three paid plans – Silver, Gold, and Platinum. The plans are available for $69, $149, and $199, respectively. You can post up to a maximum of five listings for free.

Let’s take a look at pricing plans offered by the best Renthop alternative, Roomi. First off, you can download and use it for free, which is great because there are no fees to worry about! Your roommate search is hassle-free, with five swipes each day and two listings as a free member. If you’re looking to unlock premium features, subscribe to Roomi’s Gold plan!

Why should I get Roomi’s Gold Subscription Plan?

  • Unlimited messages (plus, on mobile, you also get unlimited swipes!)
  • A Fully Verified status upgrade which gets you 5x more messages!
  • A ranking boost for 7x more views on your profile and listings.
  • 5 active listings to post all the empty rooms in your apartment.
  • Free bookings to save over $100 on safe money transfer between you and your new Roomi!

You can pay for Roomi Gold on a weekly or monthly basis. Monthly payments start at $29.99, which works out to $0.97 per day – cheaper than your morning cup of joe; and certainly more affordable than Renthop! For more information on Roomi’s pricing plans, head over to our page for more information about our subscriptions.

Related: Roomi vs Iroommates: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

Security: Can these apps help me find roommates I can trust?

Are you a student moving off-campus with no family or friends nearby? Are you new to the city? However you’re placed, Roomi helps you find roomies for your peace of mind and physical safety! Let’s compare Roomi with websites like Renthop to find out which roommate finder offers the best safety measures.

Verifies Roommate Contact Info

You can sign up for Renthop’s services by authorizing the connection to either your Google or Facebook account. However, with Roomi, you don’t have to worry about your potential roommate(s) because the roommate finder collects contact information to validate their identity. Roomi uses GlobalID, which is a digital platform that verifies users and their contact information while keeping their data safe and secure.

ID Verification

Are you asked to show your driver’s license at the supermarket or airport? Roomi has implemented similar security measures to protect its users. Roomi asks all members to upload a picture of their passport, driver’s license, or government-issued ID to verify their identity. This way, you can be sure that when you view other profiles on Roomi, they are safe and verified. On the other hand, Renthop’s users are only asked to link their social profiles for verification, making it a lot less secure than Roomi’s advanced measures.

Privacy & Security of Profiles

Roomi offers private messaging features and makes sure your personal information is safe. Additionally, under GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), you can request to have your data deleted after filling out a form! Just send an email to Roomi’s support team, and they will delete your information from our database. However, on Renthop, you’ll have to jump through some hoops to ensure your safety like filling in a privacy request form.

24/7 Support & Content Moderation

One of Roomi’s most attractive features is its content moderation team. The team filters out phony listings and ensures authenticity. The thorough verification process of Roomi makes searching for roommates reliable and safe. This makes the best Renthop alternative a powerful roommate finder. Meanwhile, Renthop doesn’t offer the same services.

Related: How do I browse people (roommates) on Roomi?

Criminal Background Check

If you need to do a background check, Roomi can help. The roommate finder searches through several international and local criminal databases. The Roomi Gold plan also gives all users a verified badge, which guarantees at least five times more visibility, which helps you find the perfect roommate without worrying! Renthop doesn’t have the same advanced security filters.

Related: 10 Important Factors For An Ideal Roommate

User Profiles: Which App Makes It Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

Both Renthop and the Renthop alternative Roomi allow you to browse roommates easily. However, with the powerful roommate finder Roomi, you can access more specific filters beyond location and price! Roomi has an advanced roommate matching algorithm with a comprehensive checklist to make sure that you end up with the perfect roommate, including senior roommates.

Is it LGBTQIA+ Friendly?

Absolutely! Roomi is an inclusive roommate finder platform that is focused on finding you the perfect roommate, whoever they may be!

Find Roommates

So, Which is the Best Roommate Finder for You?

We all know how important roommates are in a new city. They can make or break your experience of living in a new place! Roomi is a powerful roommate finder platform that gives you easy access to roommate information and simple steps for profile verification, while keeping our membership plans affordable. The platform also pays special attention to keeping private information secure.

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
